segments.text: Now please tell me something about your past work achievements .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right , madam . When I was sales manager at the Beijing Friendship Store . I succeeded in raising the yearly sales volume by 25 percent and profit margins from 50 percent to 80 percent .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That is quite an achievement ! Do you consider it your most rewarding work experience ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't think so . I'll create further achievement in the future .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I got the title of Advance Worker in 2006 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I wrote a thesis entitled On Interpersonal Relations in the Socialist Market Economy and it was published in China Daily .
segments.speaker: S2
